DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate efficacy safety two new Restylane Lip product , Restylane Lip Volume Restylane Lip Refresh , collect information injection technique .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy , Safety Injection Technique Restylane Lip Volume Restylane Lip Refresh
DOC.detailed_description: Restylane Lip Volume intend use lip enhancement Restylane Lip Refresh intend restore hydrobalance improve skin structure lip ( refer lip rejuvenation protocol ) , respectively . The lidocaine content design reduce subject 's pain treatment . The objective open , multicenter study evaluate efficacy safety product study indication collect information injection technique use .
DOC.criteria: 18 60 year age . Intent undergo lip augmentation rejuvenation upper low lip . Signed informed consent . Prior surgery tattoo upper low lip lip line . Presence abnormal lip structure , scar lump severe lip asymmetry . A history herpes labialis outbreak within four week study entry four outbreak 12 month prior study entry . Presence facial hair may interfere efficacy evaluation . Active skin disease , inflammation related condition , infection , psoriasis herpes zoster near area treat . History angioedema . Previous hypersensitivity hyaluronic acid local anesthetic . Concomitant anticoagulant therapy therapy inhibitor platelet aggregation within 10 day prior treatment , history bleeding disorder . Cancerous precancerous lesion area treat . Previous tissue augment therapy area treat hyaluronic acid ( HA ) collagen filler , laser treatment , last 12 month . Permanent implant place area treat treatment nonHA noncollagen filler area treat . Pregnancy breast feed . Participation clinical study within 30 day prior inclusion . Other condition prevent subject enter study Investigator 's opinion e.g . subject likely avoid facial cosmetic treatment level low orbital rim , subject anticipate unreliable incapable understanding study assessment unrealistic expectation treatment result . Study staff close relative study staff ( e.g . parent , child , sibling spouse ) .
